text: Location of the province of Lecce in Italy Cocumola is a small Italian town close to the Adriatic coast and about 42 km distant from Lecce. Administratively it counts as a frazione of the commune of Minervino di Lecce, and falls within the province of Lecce in the Apulia region of south-east Italy. Category:Frazioni of the Province of Lecce Category:Cities and towns in Apulia Category:Localities of Salento
title: Cocumola
